title: Bitcoin Breakdown, Gold Goes Parabolic, Clarity Act Collapse & Market Chaos

Crypto's flagship piece of legislation is on life support following attempts by the big banks to kneecap stable coins. We assess its chances as another government shutdown looms. And we'll have the top tweets, Lewis with the TA, dates for the diary, and much more besides. This is the Coin Bureau News Live.
